trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Orland Park
There were no other sightings in Orland Park on or around October 20th 2004
Summary: I headed West from Tinley and watched these lights manuever 4-6 in ridiculous unexplainable patterns in the sky t=
divs: Sighting DetailsI dropped my fiance off at chilis on Harlem and headed west on 151st street at 4-5pm in the evening. In the course of driving straight ahead I noticed these glowing lights in the West do incredible patterns and I couldnt believe what I was seeing. I stopped in the orland park mall parking lot got out watched for a min while the objects continued west I decided after calling my mom and telling her extacticly that I want pictures no one is going to believe me. I jumped in my car raced to domicks for a throw away camera got in bought it ran out and the objects were disappearing in the west and I drove as far west as I could till the street ended at the same time the objects disappeared. the patterns were amazing. If someone could contact me and let me know what I saw or if anyone else saw this I would like to know what it was or anything. Although Im not sure exactly of the date but I maybe able to narrow it down because my daughter was not born and my fiance was working still at chillis we were only together for 6-8 months so with some thought we maybe to narrow down to a month. Somebody contact me by email or whatever let me know what I saw it was broad day light out!!!
